dcterms:description: The COCO dataset contains 80 categories and 110k images for training, 5k images for validation, and 20k images for testing. It is widely used for instance segmentation tasks.
dcterms:title: COCO dataset

dcterms:creator: Mark Everingham
Luc Van Gool
Christopher K. I. Williams
John M. Winn
Andrew Zisserman
dcterms:description: The PASCAL VOC 2012 dataset has 20 categories and consists of 10582 images for training and 1449 images for validation. It is used for weakly supervised instance segmentation with box-only annotations.
dcterms:title: PASCAL VOC 2012 dataset

dcterms:creator: Marius Cordts
Mohamed Omran
Sebastian Ramos
Timo Rehfeld
Markus Enzweiler
Rodrigo Benenson
Uwe Franke
Stefan Roth
Bernt Schiele
dcterms:description: The Cityscapes dataset aims for perception in driving scenes and consists of 5000 high-resolution street-view images, with 2975 for training, 500 for validation, and 1525 for testing. It provides fine-annotated pixel-wise segmentation labels.
dcterms:title: Cityscapes dataset
